meanings.definition: A skin disease characterized by itching and the eruption of small vesicles.
meanings.sent1: My dog had tetters on his belly, causing him to scratch constantly.
meanings.sent2: The doctor diagnosed the patient with tetters after examining the itchy rash.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the tetters on its tail were a new type of toy to play with.
meanings.sent4: The garden was covered in tiny flowers, resembling the vesicles of tetters.
meanings.sent5: The children were warned not to touch the strange plant, as its leaves looked like tetters.

meanings.definition: To have or be affected with tetters.
meanings.sent1: She noticed her skin starting to tetters after spending too much time in the sun.
meanings.sent2: The old man's hands began to tetters from the harsh chemicals he used at work.
meanings.sent3: The cake seemed to tetters in the oven, rising higher than expected.
meanings.sent4: His heart tetters with excitement as he waits for the results of the competition.
meanings.sent5: The music made her feet tetters uncontrollably, causing her to dance around the room.
